alert.note: Alert for Essex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:56PM EDT until June 16 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN KING AND QUEEN...NORTHEASTERN CAROLINE AND NORTHWESTERN ESSEX COUNTIES... At 556 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fort A.p. Hill, or near Bowling Green, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Port Royal and Fort A.p. Hill around 605 PM EDT. Loretto around 635 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Rappahannock Academy, Sparta, Hustle, Supply, Central Point, Salvia and Chance. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
